document_data.name: ''Touchstone''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Touchstones''''' were a variety of smooth, hand-sized [[item enchantment|enchanted]] stones.{{Cite polyhedron/121/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms: Felshroun's Four Mages|7}}
document_data.Powers: Whenever a ''touchstone'' was touched by a bare hand it would would let out a short tune.
document_data.Availability: * The [[Rolling Gnome]] in [[Felshroun]] was known to sell these.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Jestra Illowhand]] devised a [[spell]] for creating [[gemstone]]s and [[rock crystal]]s of a similar nature, as she liked to preserve music to hear on loop in the privacy of her town.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/147/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms|43}}
